name: Joss Kutcher
description: Joss Kutcheris the sister ofRiver Ward, doing her best to be a single mother to three in harsh conditions ofRed Peaks'Trailer Park, in which she and her familylive. Joss' childhood was not an easy one. Her parents initially owned a farm that didn't succeed in the line of production. To keep business afloat, they managed to open up a small grocery store alongside it. The family of four, Joss, her brother River, and their parents lived on the floor above the store. One night armed robbers broke in looking for money. When they couldn't find anything valueble, they went upstairs and killed Joss'...
